SEARCH
Module atu.software
Package ie.atu.sw.interfaces

Interface ExaminationPaperService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ExaminationPaperServiceImpl
public interface ExaminationPaperService
Defines the contract for services that create and manage examination papers. This interface specifies methods for creating examination papers with various parameters.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ExaminationPaper
    createExaminationPaper(Set<ExaminationAllowance> allowances, List<Question> questions, int totalNumberOfQuestions, int requiredAnswers)
    Creates an examination paper with the specified allowances, questions, total number of questions, and required answers.

  • Method Details

    • createExaminationPaper

      ExaminationPaper createExaminationPaper(Set<ExaminationAllowance> allowances, List<Question> questions, int totalNumberOfQuestions, int requiredAnswers)
      Creates an examination paper with the specified allowances, questions, total number of questions, and required answers. This method is responsible for assembling an examination paper that adheres to the defined criteria and rules.
      Parameters:
      allowances - The set of specific allowances applicable to the examination (e.g., calculators, log tables).
      questions - The list of questions to be included in the examination paper.
      totalNumberOfQuestions - The total number of questions that should be present in the examination paper.
      requiredAnswers - The number of answers required from the examinee.
      Returns:
      An instance of ExaminationPaper representing the created examination paper.
